translations: v.转递（信）；递交；运送（货物）；促进（forward 的现在分词）
n.转发；促进；（最后包封面之前的）各项装订工序；货运

phrs.translation: 货运代理；货物发运；运费由提货方支付

sentences.sentence: The former owner had not left any forwarding address.
sentences.translation: 前物主没有留下任何转寄地址。

sentences.sentence: We will be forwarding you our new catalogue next week.
sentences.translation: 我们将于下星期给你寄上新的商品目录。

sentences.sentence: We will be forwarding our new catalogue to you next week.
sentences.translation: 我们将于下星期给你寄上新的商品目录。
